text:
### SCENE 06 – Writer’s Block on the Terrace  

_Time: **20:00**. Hero tries to write a new script — no ideas. Walks to terrace and hears Kavya singing; can’t see her._

*— Holi sequence TBD (dialogues needed) —*  

_Heroine suddenly smears Holi colour on Hero’s face. Next day Hero returns to that spot._

_Heroine needs a bag, T-shirt, and jeans in this scene._

---
